Job description Position Type: Full Time No of Positions: 15 Job Location: Across AP - Vijayawada, Bhimavaram, Rajahmundry and Visakhapatnam Qualification:  Any Graduation/ Degree in Hotel Management / Diploma in Hotel Management will be preferred. column2: Join us. Inspire with every cup. Working in a Tata Starbucks store is different from any other job. You are creating moments of connection with our customers every day, all around the world. You will handcraft delicious beverages and build relationships with our customers and with your fellow partners. We offer great benefits and an environment that is truly welcoming.  Upload your CV on our website https://careers.starbucks.in/  , select Apply Now Retail careers, choose a suitable role, and select your desired location. Roles: Barista (Team Member role) Full Time / Part Time: No previous experience required Eligibility : Minimum 12th passed, 18years of age  As a Tata Starbucks  barista , you'll create the  Starbucks Experience  for our customers through excellent service and expertly-crafted products. You'll be in an energetic store environment where you'll have the ability to master your food & beverage craft, work alongside friends and meet new people every day. You'll also maintain a clean and hygienic workplace. A cup of coffee and a smile can go a long way, and we believe our baristas have the power to be the best moment in each customer's day. True to  Our Mission & Values , working together we can inspire and nurture the human spirit one person, one cup, and one neighborhood at a time.      Perks and Benefits  :     5 Day workweek Flexible employment model- chose your hours/ days of work! College education offered to all partners  Best in class Meal beverage benefit Medical Insurance coverage extended to offer parental coverage with no copay Mental well being support to partners & families Starbucks Global Academy extended to partners & families Opportunity to create a positive community impact
column11: Hospitality, customer service, beverage, QSR, Restaurant, fresher, Store Operations, Customer Satisfaction, customer delight
